attributes.action: require that traffic lights be made to flash orange between the hours of 11pm and 6am.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will cut down pollution as vehicles stop and start.  It will also cut down the noise at night.  In France many traffic lights do this at night and when not necessary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
